info.title: FortiOS Monitor
info.description: REST API for configuring FortiOS objects and settings

endpoint-control--ems--status-summary--d.title: EMS ID
endpoint-control--ems--status-summary--d.description: EMS server ID (as defined in CLI table endpoint-control.fctems).

get.summary:
List endpoint records. This should only be used when you need to retrieve endpoint information from FortiEMS.
Access Group: utmgrp.endpoint-control

mac_list.title: MAC Address List
mac_list.description: MAC address list. Separated by semi-colon.

online.title: Online
online.description: 1 when the FortiClient EMS entry is online.

on_net.title: On-Net
on_net.description: 1 when the FortiClient EMS entry is not from the internet.

src.title: Traffic Source
src.description: The type of traffic that the user name is used on.

intf_allow_fortiheartbeat.title: Interface Allows Security Fabric
intf_allow_fortiheartbeat.description: True when the interface allows security fabric traffic.

avatar_source.title: Avatar Source
avatar_source.description: The type of traffic that the avatar user is used on.

quarantined.title: Quarantined
quarantined.description: True when the EMS entry is quarantined.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: intf_name
parameters.description: Filter: Name of interface where the endpoint was detected.

Download an endpoint avatar image.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

parameters.name: default
parameters.description: Default avatar name ['authuser'|'unauthuser'|'authuser_72'|'unauthuser_72']. Default avatar when endpoint / device avatar is not available. If default is not set, Not found 404 is returned.

get.summary:
Retrieve EMS connection status for a specific EMS.
Access Group: utmgrp.endpoint-control

schema.title: EMS Status
schema.description: Retrieve EMS connection status for a specific EMS.

ems_id.title: EMS ID
ems_id.description: EMS server ID (as defined in CLI table endpoint-control.fctems).

ems_name.title: EMS Name
ems_name.description: EMS server name (as defined in CLI table endpoint-control.fctems).

ems_is_connected.title: Is Connected
ems_is_connected.description: True when the configured EMS succeed with connectivity test.

ems_is_verified.title: Is Verified
ems_is_verified.description: True when the configured EMS server has a verified certificate.

items.title: Single EMS API Status
items.description: Summary of a single EMS API status.

last_error_time.title: Last EMS API Error Time
last_error_time.description: Timestamp of last known EMS API error.

ws_status.title: WebSocket Status
ws_status.description: Summarize the WebSocket close history and current status.

reason_time.title: Close Timestamp
reason_time.description: The Unix timestamp of when the close happened.

socket_error.title: WebSocket Session Error Code
socket_error.description: A string representing why a WebSocket session could not be created.

mgmt_ip.title: Management IP Address
mgmt_ip.description: Management IP address of the EMS server.

mgmt_port.title: Management Port
mgmt_port.description: Management port of the EMS server.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: ems_id
parameters.description: EMS server ID (as defined in CLI table endpoint-control.fctems).

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Scope from which to retrieve EMS connection status [vdom*|global].

get.summary:
Retrieve authentication status of the EMS server certificate for a specific EMS.
Access Group: utmgrp.endpoint-control

schema.title: EMS Certificate Status
schema.description: Retrieve authentication status of the EMS server certificate for a specific EMS.

ems_id.title: EMS ID
ems_id.description: EMS server ID (as defined in CLI table endpoint-control.fctems).

ems_name.title: EMS Name
ems_name.description: EMS server name (as defined in CLI table endpoint-control.fctems).

cert.title: Certificate
cert.description: Details of the EMS server certificate.

valid_from.title: Valid From
valid_from.description: Timestamp of the validity start date, in seconds.

valid_to.title: Valid To
valid_to.description: Timestamp of the validity end date, in seconds.

valid_from_raw.title: Valid From Raw
valid_from_raw.description: Raw validity start date string from the certificate data.

valid_to_raw.title: Valid to Raw
valid_to_raw.description: Raw validity end date string from the certificate data.

signature_algorithm.title: Signature Algorithm
signature_algorithm.description: Hashing algorithm used for the signature.

subject_raw.title: Subject Raw
subject_raw.description: Raw subject string from certificate data.

issuer_raw.title: Issuer Raw
issuer_raw.description: Raw issuer string from the certificate data.

is_ca.title: Is CA
is_ca.description: True when the certificate is a root certificate authority.

serial_number.title: Serial Number
serial_number.description: The serial number of the certificate.

items.title: Extension Field
items.description: An extension field in this certificate.

critical.title: Critical
critical.description: True when the extension is critical (has a higher priority).

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: ems_id
parameters.description: EMS server ID (as defined in CLI table endpoint-control.fctems).

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Scope from which to retrieve EMS certificate status [vdom*|global].

parameters.name: with_cert
parameters.description: Return detailed certificate information. Available when the certificate is authenticated by installed CA certificates.

get.summary:
Retrieve status summary for all configured EMS.
Access Group: utmgrp.endpoint-control

schema.title: FortiClient EMS Status Summaries
schema.description: List status summaries for configured FortiClient EMS entries.

items.title: FortiClient EMS Status Summary
items.description: Retrieve status summary of the EMS server.

name.title: EMS Name
name.description: EMS server name (as defined in CLI table endpoint-control.fctems).

cert_status.title: EMS Certificate Status

last_error_time.description: Timestamp of last known EMS API error.
